description: Evaluate the homepage navigation and main elements
steps: Visit the homepage
Verify that all header navigation links (Login, Shop, MCP Registry, GitHub) are visible and accessible
Observe the status animation on the homepage
Verify the 'Get Started' and 'Chat with us' buttons are working
Check all footer links (Privacy, Terms, MCP Registry, Credits)
expected_results: All navigation elements should be easily accessible, properly styled, and lead to the correct destinations.

steps: Navigate to the homepage
Click on the Login button in the header
Complete the Google OAuth or local simulation login process
Verify successful redirection to the Dashboard Overview
expected_results: User should be able to authenticate smoothly and be redirected to their dashboard.

steps: Login to access the dashboard
Verify all dashboard navigation links (Overview, API Keys, Sign Out)
Check that Create API Key, Documentation, and Contact Support links are functional
Navigate between dashboard sections
expected_results: Dashboard navigation should be intuitive and all links should function correctly.

description: Test the API key creation and deletion process
steps: Login to access the dashboard
Navigate to the API Keys page
Create a new API key by clicking 'Create New Key'
Enter a name 'Test Key' in the modal and confirm
Verify the new key is generated and displayed
Copy the key and close the modal
Delete the created key by clicking the delete button
Confirm the deletion in the confirmation dialog
expected_results: Users should be able to create and delete API keys smoothly with appropriate confirmations and feedback.

description: Test the MCP Registry page functionality
steps: Navigate to the homepage
Click on MCP Registry in the header
Verify the navigation link to return to Home
Test the external link to Mastra.ai Registry
Click on Create MCP Registry and verify the alert dialog displays
expected_results: The Registry page should provide clear navigation and proper alert dialogs for actions.

description: Evaluate the responsive design across different viewport sizes
steps: Visit the homepage at desktop size (1920x1080)
Resize to tablet size (768x1024) and verify layout adaptation
Resize to mobile size (375x667) and check navigation menu behavior
Test interactive elements across different sizes
expected_results: The site should adapt appropriately to different screen sizes while maintaining functionality and readability.
